pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ogr_tillerServe vector tiles from local spatial data in geopackage format# InstallationInstallation```pip3 install ogr_tiller```for updating to latest release```consolepip install ogr_tiller -U```# Usage```ogr_tiller --cache_folder ./cache/ --data_folder ./data/``````ogr_tiller --cache_folder ./cache/ --data_folder ./data/ --port 8000```
